icebreakers.prompt: Tony, as someone working at the forefront of AI with crewAI, what are some key trends you're observing in the field of AI agents that businesses should be aware of?
Having studied at the University of Pennsylvania, how did your academic experiences there shape your approach to AI and technology?
With your publication on resilience, I'd love to hear your thoughts on how resilience plays a role in navigating challenges in the tech industry.
Based on your involvement with Black in AI and NSBE, how do you see the importance of diversity impacting the evolution of the AI industry?
As a former NCAA student-athlete, do you find any parallels between the mindset required for athletics and your current work in AI development?
